message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I know you'll love it.  I'm asking for $20,000 to start.  What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer.  I appreciate your interest.  While $14,000 is a little low for me right now, I could be flexible if we can settle closer to $18,000.  Would that work for you?
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking more along the lines of $16,000. Can you meet me at that price?
